text: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ

translation.en.sahih: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
translation.id.indonesian: Maka Fir'aun dengan bala tentaranya mengejar mereka, lalu mereka ditutup oleh laut yang menenggelamkan mereka.
